title: Multifaceted impacts of widespread renewable energy integration on socio-economic, ecological, and regional development
content:
Publication date: December 2024

Source: Sustainable Futures, Volume 8

Author(s): Anis ur Rehman, Sheeraz Iqbal, Aqib Shafiq, Nahar F. Alshammari, Saadat Hanif Dar, Raja Tahir Iqbal
